member.summary: Returns true if returns true of every adjacent pair of items in the .

member.summary: Returns true if has no items in it; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: If an is provided, is used.

Yes, this does basically the same thing as the
extention. The differences: 'IsEmpty' is easier to remember and it leverages ICollection.Count if it exists.
